content: with 19 19 21 sts remaining do established to last 3 stitches before second not turn work begin gusset instep marker k2tog k1 gusset pick up and knit one stitch in each work decrease round once knit 3 rounds work decrease round once knit 2 rounds slipped stitch along side of heel pm to indicate twice work decrease round once knit 1 start of instep work 29 33 37 sts in chart round 3 times work decrease round only b instep pick up and knit same number of until 18 22 22 sts remain use kitchener stitches along remaining side of heel pm to stitch to graft toes indicate end of instep knit 9 9 11 stitches pm to indicate new beginning of the round weave in loose ends special thanks to angie kachelmeier and debi woods for test-knitting and to tunie moreno for proofreading the pattern
